attributes.action: Recovery of £5.8bn lost to fraudulent claims on CJRS
attributes.additional_details: Criminals have profited from HMRC negligence and taxpayers continue to pick up the bill while inflation soars
attributes.background: £5.8bn has been written off and ignored by the government which could be used to subsidise the NHS in addition or in place of the NI increase planned for 2022

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607090
